description: Uploaded by https://gitlab.com/gitlab-com/runbooks/-/jobs/5587601752 at Tue Nov 21 15:52:52 UTC 2023

panels.description: Apdex is a measure of requests that complete within a tolerable period of time for the service. Higher is better.

dataLinks.title: Regional Service Aggregated  Apdex SLO Analysis

seriesOverrides.alias: /6h Degradation SLO \(5% of monthly error budget\).*/
/1h Outage SLO \(2% of monthly error budget\).*/
/.*shard (apdex|error ratio|RPS)$/

panels.title: gitlab_shell SLI RPS - Requests per Second

panels.content:
### Description

We monitor GitLab shell, using HAProxy 2 SSH connection information.



### Observability Tools

* [📖 Kibana: GitLab Shell logs](https://log.gprd.gitlab.net/app/kibana#/discover?_a=(columns:!(json.command,json.msg,json.level,json.gl_project_path,json.error),filters:!((meta:(index:'AWORyp9K1NBBQZg_dXA9',key:json.stage,params:'$stage',type:phrase),query:(match:(json.stage:(query:'$stage',type:phrase)))),(meta:(index:'AWORyp9K1NBBQZg_dXA9',key:json.type,params:git,type:phrase),query:(match:(json.type:(query:git,type:phrase))))),index:'AWORyp9K1NBBQZg_dXA9')&_g=(time:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}')))

panels.title: gitlab_sshd SLI RPS - Requests per Second

panels.content:
### Description

Monitors Gitlab-sshd, using the connections bucket, and http requests bucket.



### Observability Tools

* [📖 Kibana: GitLab Shell logs](https://log.gprd.gitlab.net/app/kibana#/discover?_a=(columns:!(json.command,json.msg,json.level,json.gl_project_path,json.error),filters:!((meta:(index:'AWORyp9K1NBBQZg_dXA9',key:json.stage,params:'$stage',type:phrase),query:(match:(json.stage:(query:'$stage',type:phrase)))),(meta:(index:'AWORyp9K1NBBQZg_dXA9',key:json.type,params:git,type:phrase),query:(match:(json.type:(query:git,type:phrase))))),index:'AWORyp9K1NBBQZg_dXA9')&_g=(time:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}')))

* [📈 Kibana: GitLab Shell failed requests](https://log.gprd.gitlab.net/app/kibana#/visualize/create?type=line&indexPattern=AWORyp9K1NBBQZg_dXA9&_a=(filters:!((meta:(index:'AWORyp9K1NBBQZg_dXA9',key:json.stage,params:'$stage',type:phrase),query:(match:(json.stage:(query:'$stage',type:phrase)))),(meta:(index:'AWORyp9K1NBBQZg_dXA9',key:json.type,params:git,type:phrase),query:(match:(json.type:(query:git,type:phrase)))),(meta:(index:'AWORyp9K1NBBQZg_dXA9',key:json.level,params:error,type:phrase),query:(match:(json.level:(query:error,type:phrase))))),query:(language:kuery,query:''),vis:(aggs:!((enabled:!t,id:'1',params:(),schema:metric,type:count),(enabled:!t,id:'2',params:(drop_partials:!t,extended_bounds:(),field:json.time,interval:auto,min_doc_count:1,scaleMetricValues:!f,timeRange:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}'),useNormalizedEsInterval:!t),schema:segment,type:date_histogram))))&_g=(time:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}')))

panels.title: loadbalancer SLI RPS - Requests per Second

panels.content:
### Description

Measures aggregated HTTP request traffic through the HAProxy.
5xx responses are considered to be failures.



### Observability Tools

* [BigQuery: Top http clients by number of requests, cny stage, 10m](https://console.cloud.google.com/bigquery?project=gitlab-production&sq=805818759045:dea839bd669e41b5bc264c510294bb9f)
* [BigQuery: Top http clients by number of requests, main stage, 10m](https://console.cloud.google.com/bigquery?project=gitlab-production&sq=805818759045:704c6bdf00a743d195d344306bf207ee)

panels.title: loadbalancer_ssh SLI RPS - Requests per Second

panels.content:
### Description

Measures aggregated L4 traffic through the HAProxy. Traffic is measured in TCP connections,
with upstream TCP connection failures being treated as service-level failures.



### Observability Tools

* [BigQuery: Top ssh clients by number of requests, 10m](https://console.cloud.google.com/bigquery?project=gitlab-production&sq=805818759045:8a185b18fafe4081bf9fbdb5354844f9)

panels.title: rails_request SLI RPS - Requests per Second

panels.content:
### Description

The number of requests meeting their duration target based on the urgency
of the endpoint. By default, a request should take no more than 1s. But
this can be adjusted by endpoint.

Read more about this in the [documentation](https://docs.gitlab.com/ee/development/application_slis/rails_request_apdex.html).



### Observability Tools

* [📖 Kibana: Rails logs](https://log.gprd.gitlab.net/app/kibana#/discover?_a=(columns:!(json.status,json.method,json.meta.caller_id,json.meta.feature_category,json.path,json.request_urgency,json.duration_s,json.target_duration_s),filters:!((meta:(index:'7092c4e2-4eb5-46f2-8305-a7da2edad090',key:json.subcomponent,negate:!t,params:graphql_json,type:phrase),query:(match:(json.subcomponent:(query:graphql_json,type:phrase)))),(meta:(index:'7092c4e2-4eb5-46f2-8305-a7da2edad090',key:json.stage,params:'$stage',type:phrase),query:(match:(json.stage:(query:'$stage',type:phrase)))),(meta:(index:'7092c4e2-4eb5-46f2-8305-a7da2edad090',key:json.type,params:git,type:phrase),query:(match:(json.type:(query:git,type:phrase))))),index:'7092c4e2-4eb5-46f2-8305-a7da2edad090')&_g=(time:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}')))
* [📖 Kibana: Rails slow request logs](https://log.gprd.gitlab.net/app/kibana#/discover?_a=(columns:!(json.status,json.method,json.meta.caller_id,json.meta.feature_category,json.path,json.request_urgency,json.duration_s,json.target_duration_s),filters:!((meta:(index:'7092c4e2-4eb5-46f2-8305-a7da2edad090',key:json.subcomponent,negate:!t,params:graphql_json,type:phrase),query:(match:(json.subcomponent:(query:graphql_json,type:phrase)))),(meta:(index:'7092c4e2-4eb5-46f2-8305-a7da2edad090',key:json.stage,params:'$stage',type:phrase),query:(match:(json.stage:(query:'$stage',type:phrase)))),(meta:(index:'7092c4e2-4eb5-46f2-8305-a7da2edad090',key:json.type,params:git,type:phrase),query:(match:(json.type:(query:git,type:phrase)))),(meta:(index:'7092c4e2-4eb5-46f2-8305-a7da2edad090',key:exists,type:json.target_duration_s,value:exists),query:(exists:(field:json.target_duration_s))),(meta:(index:'7092c4e2-4eb5-46f2-8305-a7da2edad090',key:exists,type:json.duration_s,value:exists),query:(exists:(field:json.duration_s))),!((meta:(index:'7092c4e2-4eb5-46f2-8305-a7da2edad090',key:query,type:custom,value:'{"bool":+{"minimum_should_match":+1,+"should":+[{"script":+{"script":+{"source":+"doc[!'json.duration_s!'].value+>+doc[!'json.target_duration_s!'].value"}}}]}}'),query:(bool:(minimum_should_match:1,should:!((script:(script:(source:'doc[!'json.duration_s!'].value+>+doc[!'json.target_duration_s!'].value'))))))))),index:'7092c4e2-4eb5-46f2-8305-a7da2edad090',sort:!(!(json.duration_s,desc)))&_g=(time:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}')))
* [📖 Kibana: Rails failed request logs](https://log.gprd.gitlab.net/app/kibana#/discover?_a=(columns:!(json.status,json.method,json.meta.caller_id,json.meta.feature_category,json.path,json.request_urgency,json.duration_s,json.target_duration_s),filters:!((meta:(index:'7092c4e2-4eb5-46f2-8305-a7da2edad090',key:json.subcomponent,negate:!t,params:graphql_json,type:phrase),query:(match:(json.subcomponent:(query:graphql_json,type:phrase)))),(meta:(index:'7092c4e2-4eb5-46f2-8305-a7da2edad090',key:json.stage,params:'$stage',type:phrase),query:(match:(json.stage:(query:'$stage',type:phrase)))),(meta:(index:'7092c4e2-4eb5-46f2-8305-a7da2edad090',key:json.type,params:git,type:phrase),query:(match:(json.type:(query:git,type:phrase)))),(meta:(field:json.status,index:'7092c4e2-4eb5-46f2-8305-a7da2edad090',key:json.status,params:(gte:500,lte:!n),type:range),query:(range:(json.status:(gte:500,lte:!n))))),index:'7092c4e2-4eb5-46f2-8305-a7da2edad090')&_g=(time:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}')))
* [📈 Kibana: Rails requests](https://log.gprd.gitlab.net/app/kibana#/visualize/create?type=line&indexPattern=7092c4e2-4eb5-46f2-8305-a7da2edad090&_a=(filters:!((meta:(index:'7092c4e2-4eb5-46f2-8305-a7da2edad090',key:json.subcomponent,negate:!t,params:graphql_json,type:phrase),query:(match:(json.subcomponent:(query:graphql_json,type:phrase)))),(meta:(index:'7092c4e2-4eb5-46f2-8305-a7da2edad090',key:json.stage,params:'$stage',type:phrase),query:(match:(json.stage:(query:'$stage',type:phrase)))),(meta:(index:'7092c4e2-4eb5-46f2-8305-a7da2edad090',key:json.type,params:git,type:phrase),query:(match:(json.type:(query:git,type:phrase))))),query:(language:kuery,query:''),vis:(aggs:!((enabled:!t,id:'1',params:(),schema:metric,type:count),(enabled:!t,id:'2',params:(drop_partials:!t,extended_bounds:(),field:json.time,interval:auto,min_doc_count:1,scaleMetricValues:!f,timeRange:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}'),useNormalizedEsInterval:!t),schema:segment,type:date_histogram))))&_g=(time:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}')))

panels.title: Details

panels.description: Apdex is a measure of requests that complete within a tolerable period of time for the service. Higher is better.

seriesOverrides.alias: /6h Degradation SLO \(5% of monthly error budget\).*/
/1h Outage SLO \(2% of monthly error budget\).*/
/.*shard (apdex|error ratio|RPS)$/

targets.legendFormat: {{ region }} apdex
6h Degradation SLO (5% of monthly error budget)
1h Outage SLO (2% of monthly error budget)

panels.title: workhorse SLI Apdex

panels.description: Error rates are a measure of unhandled service exceptions per second. Client errors are excluded when possible. Lower is better

seriesOverrides.alias: /6h Degradation SLO \(5% of monthly error budget\).*/
/1h Outage SLO \(2% of monthly error budget\).*/
/.*shard (apdex|error ratio|RPS)$/

targets.legendFormat: {{ region }} error ratio
6h Degradation SLO (5% of monthly error budget)
1h Outage SLO (2% of monthly error budget)

panels.title: workhorse SLI Error Ratio

panels.description: The operation rate is the sum total of all requests being handle for all components within this service. Note that a single user request can lead to requests to multiple components. Higher is busier.

seriesOverrides.alias: /.*shard (apdex|error ratio|RPS)$/

targets.legendFormat: {{ region }} RPS

panels.title: workhorse SLI RPS - Requests per Second

panels.content:
### Description

Monitors the Workhorse instance running in the Git fleet, via the HTTP interface. This SLI
excludes API requests, which have their own SLI with tigher latency thresholds.
Websocket connections are excluded from the apdex score.



### Observability Tools

* [Google Stackdriver Continuous Profiling](https://console.cloud.google.com/profiler;timespan=4h/workhorse-git;type=CPU/cpu?project=gitlab-production)
* [🐞 Sentry Releases](https://new-sentry.gitlab.net/organizations/gitlab/releases/?project=15&environment=${environment})
* [🐞 Sentry issues](https://new-sentry.gitlab.net/organizations/gitlab/issues/?project=15&environment=${environment})
* [📖 Kibana: Workhorse logs](https://log.gprd.gitlab.net/app/kibana#/discover?_a=(columns:!(json.method,json.remote_ip,json.status,json.uri,json.duration_ms),filters:!((meta:(index:'a4f5b470-edde-11ea-81e5-155ba78758d4',key:json.type.keyword,params:git,type:phrase),query:(match:(json.type.keyword:(query:git,type:phrase)))),(meta:(index:'a4f5b470-edde-11ea-81e5-155ba78758d4',key:json.stage,params:'$stage',type:phrase),query:(match:(json.stage:(query:'$stage',type:phrase)))),(meta:(index:'a4f5b470-edde-11ea-81e5-155ba78758d4',key:json.type,params:git,type:phrase),query:(match:(json.type:(query:git,type:phrase))))),index:'a4f5b470-edde-11ea-81e5-155ba78758d4')&_g=(time:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}')))
* [📖 Kibana: Workhorse slow request logs](https://log.gprd.gitlab.net/app/kibana#/discover?_a=(columns:!(json.method,json.remote_ip,json.status,json.uri,json.duration_ms),filters:!((meta:(index:'a4f5b470-edde-11ea-81e5-155ba78758d4',key:json.type.keyword,params:git,type:phrase),query:(match:(json.type.keyword:(query:git,type:phrase)))),(meta:(index:'a4f5b470-edde-11ea-81e5-155ba78758d4',key:json.stage,params:'$stage',type:phrase),query:(match:(json.stage:(query:'$stage',type:phrase)))),(meta:(index:'a4f5b470-edde-11ea-81e5-155ba78758d4',key:json.type,params:git,type:phrase),query:(match:(json.type:(query:git,type:phrase)))),(meta:(field:json.duration_ms,index:'a4f5b470-edde-11ea-81e5-155ba78758d4',key:json.duration_ms,params:(gte:10000,lte:!n),type:range),query:(range:(json.duration_ms:(gte:10000,lte:!n))))),index:'a4f5b470-edde-11ea-81e5-155ba78758d4',sort:!(!(json.duration_ms,desc)))&_g=(time:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}')))
* [📖 Kibana: Workhorse failed request logs](https://log.gprd.gitlab.net/app/kibana#/discover?_a=(columns:!(json.method,json.remote_ip,json.status,json.uri,json.duration_ms),filters:!((meta:(index:'a4f5b470-edde-11ea-81e5-155ba78758d4',key:json.type.keyword,params:git,type:phrase),query:(match:(json.type.keyword:(query:git,type:phrase)))),(meta:(index:'a4f5b470-edde-11ea-81e5-155ba78758d4',key:json.stage,params:'$stage',type:phrase),query:(match:(json.stage:(query:'$stage',type:phrase)))),(meta:(index:'a4f5b470-edde-11ea-81e5-155ba78758d4',key:json.type,params:git,type:phrase),query:(match:(json.type:(query:git,type:phrase)))),(meta:(field:json.status,index:'a4f5b470-edde-11ea-81e5-155ba78758d4',key:json.status,params:(gte:500,lte:!n),type:range),query:(range:(json.status:(gte:500,lte:!n))))),index:'a4f5b470-edde-11ea-81e5-155ba78758d4')&_g=(time:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}')))

* [📈 Kibana: Workhorse sum latency aggregated](https://log.gprd.gitlab.net/app/kibana#/visualize/create?type=line&indexPattern=a4f5b470-edde-11ea-81e5-155ba78758d4&_a=(filters:!((meta:(index:'a4f5b470-edde-11ea-81e5-155ba78758d4',key:json.type.keyword,params:git,type:phrase),query:(match:(json.type.keyword:(query:git,type:phrase)))),(meta:(index:'a4f5b470-edde-11ea-81e5-155ba78758d4',key:json.stage,params:'$stage',type:phrase),query:(match:(json.stage:(query:'$stage',type:phrase)))),(meta:(index:'a4f5b470-edde-11ea-81e5-155ba78758d4',key:json.type,params:git,type:phrase),query:(match:(json.type:(query:git,type:phrase))))),query:(language:kuery,query:''),vis:(aggs:!((enabled:!t,id:'1',params:(field:json.duration_ms),schema:metric,type:sum),(enabled:!t,id:'2',params:(drop_partials:!t,extended_bounds:(),field:json.time,interval:auto,min_doc_count:1,scaleMetricValues:!f,timeRange:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}'),useNormalizedEsInterval:!t),schema:segment,type:date_histogram)),params:(valueAxes:!((id:'ValueAxis-1',labels:(filter:!t,rotate:0,show:!t,truncate:100),name:'LeftAxis-1',position:left,scale:(mode:normal,type:linear),show:!t,style:(),title:(text:'Sum+Request+Duration:+json.duration_ms'),type:value)))))&_g=(time:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}')))

panels.description: Apdex is a measure of requests that complete within a tolerable period of time for the service. Higher is better.

seriesOverrides.alias: /6h Degradation SLO \(5% of monthly error budget\).*/
/1h Outage SLO \(2% of monthly error budget\).*/
/.*shard (apdex|error ratio|RPS)$/

targets.legendFormat: {{ region }} RPS

panels.title: workhorse_auth_api SLI RPS - Requests per Second

panels.content:
### Description

Monitors Workhorse API endpoints, running in the Git fleet, via the HTTP interface.
Workhorse API requests have much tigher latency requirements, as these requests originate in GitLab-Shell
and are on the critical path for authentication of Git SSH commands.



### Observability Tools

* [Google Stackdriver Continuous Profiling](https://console.cloud.google.com/profiler;timespan=4h/workhorse-git;type=CPU/cpu?project=gitlab-production)
* [🐞 Sentry Releases](https://new-sentry.gitlab.net/organizations/gitlab/releases/?project=15&environment=${environment})
* [🐞 Sentry issues](https://new-sentry.gitlab.net/organizations/gitlab/issues/?project=15&environment=${environment})
* [📖 Kibana: Workhorse logs](https://log.gprd.gitlab.net/app/kibana#/discover?_a=(columns:!(json.method,json.remote_ip,json.status,json.uri,json.duration_ms),filters:!((meta:(index:'a4f5b470-edde-11ea-81e5-155ba78758d4',key:json.type.keyword,params:git,type:phrase),query:(match:(json.type.keyword:(query:git,type:phrase)))),(meta:(index:'a4f5b470-edde-11ea-81e5-155ba78758d4',key:json.stage,params:'$stage',type:phrase),query:(match:(json.stage:(query:'$stage',type:phrase)))),(meta:(index:'a4f5b470-edde-11ea-81e5-155ba78758d4',key:json.type,params:git,type:phrase),query:(match:(json.type:(query:git,type:phrase))))),index:'a4f5b470-edde-11ea-81e5-155ba78758d4')&_g=(time:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}')))
